author: Mike H.
comment: It's doesn't work as advertised. Doesn't display unread counts for email/sms. In addition, the settings menu fails to open. It will force close the app within seconds after attempting to open settings.
title: Nice, but:

author: William Austin
comment: Unfortunately the customizations listed on the paid verson's Web page do not indicate that it can change to a dark background.  So for my purposes it's just another one in the herd, and I'll  probably just delete it for now and revisit the site in a month or so to see whether a dark background becomes available.
title: It's  OK and works correctly

author: James Morgan
comment: Would have 5 stars... Favorite watch face it's only downfall is that its supposed to display phone battery along with watch battery, phone battery constantly reads 0%...Any fix for that? Will give 5 stars when fixed
title: Overall favorite watch face...

author: Andrew Pinson
comment: I'm having the same problem with this watch face that a lot of people seem to be having.  Running a Nexus 6 on the latest version of  Android. Every time I try to access the settings, the watch face stops responding so setting can't be changed.
title: Great watch face with annoying issue.

author: Siddharth Deb Varman
comment: Keeps crashing within the wear app when trying to look at menu options. Plus it does not read the phone's battery. Love to rate much higher
title: Looks great but keeps crashing on the phone

author: Michael Beam
comment: Force closes when trying to go to settings. Phone battery doesn’t show. If these things don't work on free version I am certainly not paying for it. Designed nicely but doesn't work.
title: Force closing

author: Derek Morr
comment: The settings app in Android Wear continually crashes. It's a shame because this app looks like it has promise.
title: Crashes constantly

author: Alpha_omega_x
comment: for some reason when trying to change any settings on the watch face nothing happens, it just crashes and keeps the watch face as it is. is this app no longer being supported?

author: Jus Me
comment: Simply, font is waaaay too small. Everyone doesn't have great eyes. Every time I tried to go in settings, it would crash. Uninstalled.
title: Good Idea, But...

author: Michael Mancini
comment: Nice design, but no go on moto 360 2nd gen and moto N6. The app settings crash and the watchface has no interactivity because of it.. bummer..
title: Constantly Crashes

author: Vasilios Tselonis
comment: I was really looking forward to this watchface, unfortunately when you go into that android wear app and attempt to access this apps settings it crashes.
title: Looks good but crashes

author: Dennis Pishev
comment: It's fine. The design is nice. Two things I didn't like, and about the uninstall it now: 1) the position of the time when screen is dimmed is different from when it's bright, so it's not so good user experience. 2) phone's battery shows 0% - bug.

author: Siddharth Nair
comment: Always crashes when you open settings in Android wear. Good looking face though. Would use it as my main watch face if it didn't crash all the time.

author: Joel James
comment: Lg g4 with lg g watch. Crashes everytime
title: Screen shots look good but can't open app

author: Tomy Stoykov
comment: Don't touch this! Never! I don't even think that there is a premium version or this trash!
title: That's the worst app for wear!

author: Chris Bobo
comment: Looks great on my LG G Watch, but I can't open the settings to change anything - force closes every time.
title: Settings

author: Beastly BMW
comment: Can't open, keeps closing! Looks nice on my LG G Watch R.
title: Crashes

author: David D
comment: Would give 5 stars if settings actually worked. It's a shame it doesn't work
title: To bad

author: David B
comment: I really like the watch face but just like others have reported, my s6 can't open the settings for it without it crashing. Moto 360 1st Gen
title: Cool but can't open settings

author: Ian King
comment: Looks like a nice watch face.  Unfortunately, settings in Android Wear just causes a crash

author: Tyler Nielsen
comment: Really sharp, but the lack of phone battery working on the face costs it 2 stars. I have a Nexus 6.
title: Phone battery does not show up.

author: Chay Prom
comment: Phone battery will not show up... looks odd. Nice face, just need to work out the bugs.

author: Zachary Bohlman
comment: I can get it to show up on my 360 but if I try to access the settings through the wear app I get a "has stopped" message every time. Galaxy s6 on 5.1.1. Tried uninstalling app, didn't help.
title: Error message

author: Nate Starrett
comment: Unable to configure, sms and mesage counters remains at 0, phone battery also at 0.  Moto-360 1st gen,  android LG G4 phone.
title: Problems like what others reported

author: Alec Sanchez
comment: Uninstalled app because it Constantly shuts down when going to open the settings. I have a moto Z Droid and my Moto 360 2nd gen.

author: M A
comment: Doesn't work on Android 6.0.1 (s7 edge). Force closes in settings +makes my watch faces crash even if this apps watch face isn't set.
title: Problems on Android 6.0.1

author: QP Geek
comment: It has always stopped Setting  with moto360 gen1st and motorola's nexus6.I hope it will be fixed.
title: I can't go setting tab!

author: Chuck Carroll
comment: I can set the face from my Moto360, but when I try to open up settings through the Android Wear app, it crashes.
title: Settings crashes

author: Erik Austin
comment: Every time I try to open the settings,  the whole thing crashes. Shame, because I like it otherwise
title: Like the look,  can't get to settings

author: Gerald Takeda
comment: Keep on crashing when I go to Settings
title: Sux big time!

author: Jethro Ng Guo Jie
comment: No 24hr time, 1pm shows as 0100, which is technically 1am. Phone battery indicator does not work.
title: Nice interface, poor UI.

author: lee bob
comment: Every time I click settings to alter the watch face it just crashes
title: Keeps crashing.Can only use default watch face!

author: Scott Richardson
comment: Tried using the settings and it just says has stopped working so I've deleted it.
title: Doesn't work

author: Dave Passmore
comment: Can't change any settings in the app due to it force closing every time, phone battery also does not sync, shame as it looks good.
title: Constant force close

author: John Sidarovich
comment: Can't open the settings ...might as well have installed a nice green text watchface with no phone battery .....
title: Doesn't work

author: Adam Thomas
comment: Phone battery percentage always at 0%. Watch face does not work correctly
title: Bad

author: Scott Roebuck
comment: This app is broken, doesn't work on HTC M8 or Samsung s8, nor does it work on wear 1.5 or 2.0

author: Orlando Negri
comment: Unfortunately this application has stopped.
title: Does not work in my Sony Smartwatch 3

author: Daniel Watson
comment: Missing a setting app. No phone battery. Move along....this is not the watchface you're looking for.
title: Lacking

author: Steven Nascimben
comment: Seriously, why is this app even in the store? What a joke.
title: How can this crap stay
